citations.desc: Primary enclosures used to transport live birds.
citations.narrative:
The transport carriers for both birds only had two small vents, one on each opposing side, which did not comprise 16% of
the surface area of the wall. There must be ventilation openings located on two vertical walls of the primary enclosure that
are at least 16% of the surface area of such wall or ventilation openings on all four walls of the primary enclosure that are
at least 8% of the total surface area of each such wall.
Correct by 31 August 2025

citations.desc: Primary enclosures used to transport live birds.
citations.narrative:
Neither of the enclosures for the birds had the required projecting rims or other devices on the exterior of the outside walls
with any ventilation openings. The projecting rims or similar devices must be large enough to provide a minimum air
circulation space of 0.75 inches between the primary enclosure and anything the enclosure is adjacent to, unless 90% or
greater of the surface area of the enclosure wall is open.
Correct by 31 August 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the manager.
n

narrative:
3.162(b)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures used to transport live birds. 
The transport carriers for both birds only had two small vents, one on each opposing side, which did not comprise 16% of 
the surface area of the wall. There must be ventilation openings located on two vertical walls of the primary enclosure that 
are at least 16% of the surface area of such wall or ventilation openings on all four walls of the primary enclosure that are 
at least 8% of the total surface area of each such wall. 
 
Correct by 31 August 2025 
3.162(b)(2) 
   
Primary enclosures used to transport live birds. 
Neither of the enclosures for the birds had the required projecting rims or other devices on the exterior of the outside walls 
with any ventilation openings. The projecting rims or similar devices must be large enough to provide a minimum air 
circulation space of 0.75 inches between the primary enclosure and anything the enclosure is adjacent to, unless 90% or 
greater of the surface area of the enclosure wall is open. 
 
Correct by 31 August 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the manager.
